table.name: IAMAccount
table.description: Root entity in Zoho. Links data, belongs to a User or a group of Users, stored across Zoho Apps

column.name: ACCOUNT_NAME
column.description: Name of the organization

column.name: DISPLAY_NAME
column.description: Display Name of the organization

table.name: IAMAccountDomain
table.description: Unique, human readable, identifier of an Account. For example, www.zohocorp.com, vtitan, etc., Ownership will be verified while adding a domain if it contains a "." symbol

column.name: DOMAIN
column.description: The same Domain stored in the System space is replicated here for easy reading without switching data spaces

column.name: IS_VERIFIED
column.description: Will be set to true only if the given verification code is correct

column.name: PARENT_DOMAIN
column.description: If any alised domain is added then it's parent domain will be addded here.

table.name: IAMAccountInvitation
table.description: Invitation for a user to participate in this account. Send by the Account Administrator. The invitation template is customizable using "AccountMailTemplate" resource

column.name: INVITE_STATUS
column.description: Status of the invitation. Read only column for the applications. Value is computed systematically. 0 - Pending, 1 - Accepted, 2 - Rejected

column.name: RESEND_LIMIT
column.description: Restriction Limit for resending account invitation

column.name: FROM_URL
column.description: Url to be redirected

column.name: IDP
column.description: Used to invoke directly to idp openid not to accounts register page.

column.name: ARGS_DATA
column.description: Other data used in digest is stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMAccountInvitationDetails
table.description: Invitation for a user to participate in this account. Send by the Account Administrator. The invitation template is customizable using "AccountMailTemplate" resource

column.name: ZAAID
column.description: App Account ID for which user is invited.

column.name: APP_NAME
column.description: Service name for which it is invited. It will used in Multi AppAccount support.

column.name: ROLE_NAME
column.description: Role name to zarid in appaccount member

column.name: ACCEPT_URL
column.description: Url to be redirected

column.name: REJECT_URL
column.description: Url to be redirected

column.name: ARGS_DATA
column.description: Other data used in digest is stored as JSON object.

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Status of the Invitation for that app. It will used by that apps to mark as inactive to block Accpting invitation. Value is computed systematically. 0 - Inactive, 1 - Active

column.name: ORG_ROLE
column.description: Used to specify Org role for Invited Users

column.name: RESEND_LIMIT
column.description: Reinvitation Limit

column.name: REJECT_STATUS
column.description: Reject Status of the invitation. Read only column for the applications. Value is computed systematically. 2 - Rejected

table.name: IAMAccountJoinRequests
table.description: Invitation for a user to participate in this account. Send by the Account Administrator. The invitation template is customizable using "AccountMailTemplate" resource

column.name: STATUS
column.description: Status of the Request. Read only column for the applications. Value is computed systematically. 0 - Pending, 1 - Accepted, 2 - Rejected

column.name: ARGS_DATA
column.description: Other data used is stored as JSON object.

table.name: IAMLocation
table.description: Geographical location from where members are participating in this Account

column.name: ADDRESS_TYPE
column.description: 1 - Work (2^0), 2 - Residential current(2^1), 4 - Residential permanent(2^2), 8 - KYC Address(2^3)

column.name: IS_PRIMARY
column.description: Non Primary - 0, Primary - 1

table.name: IAMSAMLApp
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as saml ID provider

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description about this App. Used for display purpose

column.name: ACS_URL
column.description: Saml Acs url of the app.

column.name: IDENTIFIER
column.description: Identify the app.

column.name: APP_ID
column.description: Random ID to identify app.

column.name: NAME_ID_FIELD
column.description: Used to store whcih field should be returned in NameId. 1 - Email

column.name: SIGN_IN_URL
column.description: Url to initiate the signin request.

column.name: DEFAULT_RELAY_STATE
column.description: Url to provide default relay state.

column.name: PUBLIC_KEY
column.description: Public key to share to user.

column.name: PRIVATE_KEY
column.description: Private key to sign.

column.name: IDP_MODE_SUPPORTED
column.description: used to specify wheather IDP mode is supported or not. If not SIGN_IN_URL is mandatory for IDP initiate.

column.name: ZID_TYPE
column.description: AppAccount , Group , Account, User

column.name: LOGOUT_URL
column.description: logout URL of service.

table.name: IAMSAMLAppAttribute
table.description: Used to store other third party apps, that are using zoho as saml ID provider

column.name: ATTRIBUTE_VALUE
column.description: Used to store whcih field should be returned in Attribute. 1 - Email, 2 - Firstname, 3 - LastName, 4 - FullName, 5 - UserName

table.name: IAMAnnouncements
table.description: Annoucement to all account members by the administrator

column.name: ANNOUNCEMENT_AUTO_ID
column.description: Unique ID for announcements

column.name: ANNOUNCEMENT_ID
column.description: Unique ID for announcements

column.name: TITLE
column.description: Title for the announcement

column.name: EXPIRY_DATE
column.description: Dead line to show this announcement

column.name: CONTENT
column.description: Description for the announcement

column.name: ANNOUNCEMENT_OWNER
column.description: The owner resource of this announcement. Ex: If a annoucement is created for a group with ZGID A, the ANNOUNCEMENT_OWNER will be A, and ANNOUNCEMENT_OWNER_RESOURCE will be group

column.name: ANNOUNCEMENT_STATUS
column.description: The approval status of this annoucement. It might be approved at org level or at group level. 0 - Unapproved, 10-Approved at group level 20-Approved at org level

table.name: IAMAccountPolicy
table.description: Account specific value for policies defined by an App which is available at "App/[app-name]/PolicyConfig". For example, shareToExternalUsers.

column.name: POLICY_KEY
column.description: Identifies a policy attribute, for example, share to external users, of the App. The meta data (Data Type: FILE, INTEGER, BOOLEAN, etc.,) about this attribute key will only be present in the System space.

column.name: POLICY_VALUE
column.description: Value of the policy attribute

table.name: IAMAccountConfiguration
table.description: Account specific system configurations used in Zoho Services. For example, Validity period for unconfirmed accounts

column.name: CONFIG_NAME
column.description: Name of the configuration in dot notation format. For example, {feature}.{parameter}

column.name: CONFIG_VALUE
column.description: Value of the configuration. The value can be set during deployment and can be changed in run time from Zoho Accounts Admin Console

table.name: IAMAutomation
table.description: Automation is a process of simplifying the human work. In an organization it will be helpful for the administrators in provisioning and de-provisioning a user whenever an employee is hired or resigned.

column.name: AUTOMATION_NAME
column.description: Name of the automation

column.name: DESCRIPTION
column.description: A short description

column.name: TYPE
column.description: Type of the automation

column.name: RESOURCE_TO_LISTEN
column.description: Plain URI or Resource Name Ex: account/123454/user or just User.

column.name: CHILD_RESOURCES_TO_INCLUDE
column.description: Comma separated sub resources to include

column.name: CRITERIA
column.description: Criteria string as JSON

column.name: OPERATION
column.description: POST / PUT / DELETE

table.name: IAMAutomationResourceAction
table.description: An automation process to update a resource automatically whenever another resource is updated. Ex : Whenever a user is added in the organization [For ex : ZohoCorp] Assign the user to "india-all" mailing group. Add the user to the "Business" app account.

column.name: RESOURCE_ACTION_ID
column.description: A unique value generated by the system to access the resouce action

column.name: RESOURCE_URI_TO_UPDATE
column.description: The Resource URI to update ex: account/11111111/group/india-all

column.name: RESOURCE_OPERATION
column.description: POST / PUT / DELETE

column.name: RESOURCE_CRITERIA
column.description: Criteria string as JSON for PUT and DELETE operations $value.ResourceMapping.DESTINATION_COlUMN_NAME will be replace with Source column value.

table.name: IAMAutomationResourceMapping
table.description: The mapping between the source and destination objects.

column.name: RESOURCE_MAPPING_ACTION_ID
column.description: A unique value generated by the system to access the resouce mapping column

column.name: DESTINATION_COLUMN_NAME
column.description: The name of the destination column. Destination -- The resource to be updated

column.name: SRC_COLUMN_NAME
column.description: The name of the source column. Source -- The resource that is updated and listened

column.name: DEFAULT_VALUE
column.description: The default value to be set if the SRC_COLUMN_NAME value is null or if the SRC_COLUMN_NAME is not set

table.name: IAMAutomationEmailAction
table.description: An automation process to send an notification email whenever a resource is updated.

column.name: EMAIL_ACTION_ID
column.description: A unique id generated by the system to identify the email action

column.name: EMAIL_IDS
column.description: Comma separated list of email ids

column.name: EMAIL_TEMPLATE_URI
column.description: The email template uri

table.name: IAMAutomationNotifyAction
table.description: An automation process to notify the action to a remote url

column.name: URL_ACTION_ID
column.description: A unique id generated by the system to identify the notification action

table.name: IAMSAMLUser
table.description: permit SAML flow if the user is an SAML user

column.name: ZID
column.description: Unique ID of the saml user across Zoho

table.name: IAMDesignations
table.description: Unique, human readable, identifier of an Account. For example, www.zohocorp.com, vtitan, etc., Ownership will be verified while adding a domain if it contains a "." symbol

column.name: DESIGNATION_ID
column.description: Unique ID of the user across Zoho

table.name: IAMAccountRemoteAuthConf
table.description: Account specific system configurations used in Zoho Services. For example, Validity period for unconfirmed accounts

column.name: SECRET_KEY
column.description: pre shared key for jwt authentication.

column.name: VERIFICATION_URL
column.description: the url , is to get the jwt token response.

column.name: DEFAULT_SERVICE_NAME
column.description: client service name.

table.name: IAMAccountKYC
table.description: The KYC deatils for the ORG

column.name: ZUID
column.description: The zuid of the org admin

column.name: ORGANISATION_NAME
column.description: Name of the Organisation

column.name: INDUSTRY
column.description: The type of industory/sector

column.name: EMPLOYEE_COUNT
column.description: The employess count of the organisation

column.name: ORG_CONTACT_EMAILID
column.description: The Email id of the org contact

column.name: FIRST_NAME
column.description: The First Name of the org contact

column.name: LAST_NAME
column.description: The Last Name of the org contact

column.name: MOBILE_NUMBER
column.description: The Mobile Number of the org contact

column.name: DESIGNATION
column.description: The Designation of the org contact

table.name: IAMAccountKYCContact
table.description: The contact information of the Org admin

column.name: EMAIL_ID
column.description: The EMAIl ID of the contact person

column.name: FIRST_NAME
column.description: The First Name of the contact person

column.name: LAST_NAME
column.description: The Last Name of the contact person
